summary.span: 提供一个用于在 XHTML 标记中呈现移动控件的默认控件适配器。

span.span: Provides a default control adapter for rendering mobile controls in XHTML markup.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供呈现控件和每个移动设备的 XHTML 标记中子级的基本移动控件适配器。This class provides a base mobile control adapter that renders a control and each of its children in XHTML markup for mobile devices. 它还为派生的 XHTML 移动控件适配器提供帮助器方法和公共属性。It also provides helper methods and common properties for derived XHTML mobile control adapters. 控件适配器是组件，可以重写某些类方法和事件，以允许特定于浏览器或特定于标记的处理。Control adapters are components that override certain class methods and events to allow browser-specific or markup-specific handling. 呈现行为的适应性很多封装在类。Much of the adaptability in rendering behavior is encapsulated in the class. 如果您正在考虑是否要生成你自己的控件适配器，请记住，一个适配器可以用来重写一些浏览器类的行为。If you are considering whether to build your own control adapter, keep in mind that a single adapter can be used to override a number of browser class behaviors. 或者，通过在派生类中包含所需的适应性类，您可能无需使用控件适配器。Alternatively, by including the desired adaptability in a class derived from the class, you might eliminate the need to use a control adapter. 特定控件类的适配器适用于所有控件都继承自该类的除非存在更专业的适配器。An adapter for a specific control class applies to all controls that inherit from that class, unless more specialized adapters are present. 例如，类用于验证的设备的需要，也可以显示 XHTML 标记的所有移动控件。For example, the class is used to validate all mobile controls for devices that require or can display XHTML markup. 在处理期间，.NET Framework 截获对特定于当前的目标控件的方法的调用。During processing, the .NET Framework intercepts calls to the methods of a control that are specific to the current target. 如果与控件关联的控件适配器时，.NET Framework 调用关联的适配器方法。If a control adapter is associated with the control, the .NET Framework calls the associated adapter methods. 控件的某些属性可管理跨多个辅助页为移动设备上的显示的方式。Some properties of a control govern the way it displays across multiple secondary pages for a mobile device. 这些页统称为*辅助用户界面*。These page are collectively known as *secondary UI*. 属性可以用于定义将显示哪一页。The property can be used to define which page will be displayed. 方法可用于删除任何辅助用户界面设置。The method can be used to remove any secondary UI settings.

permission.span: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

span.para: 继承自类中，您的适配器名称模式中为给定的控件类型和标记语言 (例如， )。提供 XHTML 标记的控件的适配器应该实现中命名空间。应为每个配置.browser 文件中的设备节点下的专用控件定义任何专用的适配器。正确实现的控件不应假定附加了适配器，或附加的适配器实现特定接口。相反，它应该检查这些条件。多种条件呈现方法允许为这种情况作为辅助用户界面和需要分行符，或每个嵌入式控件的每个块后的显示设备的。这些条件的方法的示例包括和。这些方法都适用于给定的设备，而不考虑所呈现的控件。不太可能需要创建基于此类的新控件适配器时重写这些方法。至少，您将需要重写方法。设备筛选所需的服务器控件使用一个特定的适配器。有关设备筛选的详细信息，请参阅[体系结构概述的自适应控件行为](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)并[设备筛选概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19)。

When you inherit from the class, name your adapter for a given control type and markup language in the pattern (for example, ). Adapters for a control that provides XHTML markup should be implemented in the namespace. Any specialized adapters should be defined for the specialized control under each of the device nodes in the configuration .browser files. A properly implemented control should not assume that an adapter is attached, or that the attached adapter implements a specific interface. Instead, it should check for these conditions. A number of conditional rendering methods allow for such conditions as secondary UI and for display devices that require line breaks after every block or after every inline control. Examples of these conditional methods are and . These methods work for a given device regardless of the control being rendered. It is unlikely you would need to override these methods when creating a new control adapter based on this class. At a minimum, you would need to override the methods. Device filtering is required to use a specific adapter for a server control. For more information about device filtering, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff) and [Device Filtering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19).

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果目标设备需要在块级别的元素上中断，如`
`，由指定的文本编写器`writer`开始呈现元素时设置挂起的分行符，并自动将呈现一个分行符 (`
`) 末尾的元素。If the target device requires breaks on block-level elements such as `
`, the text writer specified by `writer` sets a pending break when starting to render the element, and automatically renders a break (`
`) at the end of the element. 如果在设备上的一个逻辑页超出了元素的内容，则适配器会清除挂起的分行符末尾的页面。If the content of the element extends beyond one logical page on the device, the adapter clears the pending break at the end of the page. 此方法主要用于通过.NET Framework 在内部。This method is primarily used by the .NET Framework internally.

span.para: 基实现从视图状态加载当前辅助用户界面模式。可以重写它从视图状态加载其他特定的数据，但请务必也调用基方法，以便跨请求保留辅助用户界面模式。管理视图状态的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

The base implementation of loads the current secondary UI mode from view state. You can override it to load other specific data from view state, but be sure to also invoke the base method in order to preserve the secondary UI mode across requests. For more information on managing view state, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法通过删除以下信息来减少对其基本参数的查询字符串：Use this method to reduce the query string to its basic parameters by removing the following information: - 文件名称和路径信息。The file name and path information. - 参数指定当前。A parameter specifying the current . - 参数名为"x-up-descharset"，它指定当前的字符集。A parameter named "x-up-descharset", which specifies the current character set. 页适配器使用返回的查询字符串来创建对象以访问其余参数及其值。The page adapter uses the returned query string to create a object to access the remaining parameters and their values. 此方法主要用于通过.NET Framework 在内部。This method is primarily used by the .NET Framework internally.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由自定义适配器的开发人员使用。This method is primarily used by developers of custom adapters.

span.para: 基实现保存视图状态中的当前辅助用户界面模式。可以重写它以保存视图状态中的其他特定数据，但请务必从基类中，获取当前状态，然后将其与结合特定于控件的状态以在请求之间保留辅助用户界面模式。管理视图状态的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

The base implementation of saves the current secondary UI mode in view state. You can override it to save other specific data from view state, but be sure to obtain the current state from the base class, and then combine it with your control-specific state in order to preserve the secondary UI mode across requests. For more information on managing view state, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示其他屏幕用户界面的控件使用的辅助用户界面。Secondary UI is used by controls that show additional screens of a user interface. 若要使用的辅助用户界面，控件适配器，请执行以下步骤：To use secondary UI, a control adapter performs the following steps: 1. 在回发事件期间设置了控件适配器中的属性基类。During a postback event, the control adapter sets the property in the base class. 2. 在呈现时，该控件检查辅助用户界面模式，并呈现相应的辅助用户界面。In rendering, the control checks the secondary UI mode, and renders the appropriate secondary UI. 3. 在响应用户与辅助用户界面的交互，控件适配器可能会将辅助用户界面模式更改为另一个值，或通过调用退出辅助用户界面模式方法。In response to user interaction with the secondary UI, the control adapter might change the secondary UI mode to another value, or exit secondary UI mode by calling the method. 此属性主要由自定义适配器的开发人员使用。This property is primarily used by developers of custom adapters.
